name: Farmtopia
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Try your hand at running your own farm!

Farming has never been more entertaining as you feed your animals and gather their produce to sell at the market. Spend your earnings on upgrading your farm facilities to churn out products faster than before!
  • Fast and furious time-management game with over 45 levels to complete
  • Nine farm products to cultivate and sell at the market
  • Five animals to care for and protect from the angry bears
  • Save up your earnings to upgrade to any of six farm buildings
